name: deleteData
shortDescription: Deletes previously stored data from Homegear's key-value database
description: This method deletes previously stored data from Homegear's key-value database.

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: The name of the component to get values for as used in setData().

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key as defined in setData(). If ommited all values for the component are returned.
